titles.title: A bill to amend the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to extend through the fiscal year 1989 the authority contained in such Act related to drug abuse prevention activities.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.

calendar.text: Received in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 851.

bill.summary: 5/24/1988--Introduced. Amends the Domestic Volunteer Service Act of 1973 to extend through FY 1989 the authorization of appropriations for drug abuse prevention activities.
